verbose_text: The von Hippel-Lindau (pVHL) protein, which functions as an E3 ligase, binds to hydroxylated HIF-1alpha and recruits an E3 ubiquitin ligase complex that contains elongin-B, elongin-C, and cullin 2, thereby promoting ubiquitination and 26S proteasome mediated degradation of HIF-1alpha XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: pVHL) protein, which functions as an E3 ligase, binds to hydroxylated HIF-1alpha
